channel.title: Dataflow on Nicolas Bontempo
channel.description: Recent content in Dataflow on Nicolas Bontempo

item.title: Processing Pipelines (Dataflow) - Introduction
item.description: Hello Guys, recently I changed a job going to a new challenge into Take. From this, I’m studying parts of the stack which Dataflow is a big part. This is the start of my summary mostly provided by the study of the documentation and some coding. Processing Pipelines (Dataflow) - Introduction The library Dataflow provides several functions to intensive processing. When you develop some logic using the concept of pipelines, basically you are creating steps of processing called blocks.
